amendment.description: To require the Inspector General of the Department of Homeland Security to review each Secure Border Initiative contract valued at more than $20,000,000 and to report the findings of such reviews to the Secretary of Homeland Security and to Congress.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4672 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
